markdown:
| icon           = poe2 rolled_letter icon.png
| description    = The brief letter is written in a sharp, deliberate hand. Many of the letters have bitten through the parchment.

"Watcher,

I asked you to help me find Giacolo, and now you have gotten him killed. I should never have trusted you.

For your sake, you should hope our paths do not cross again.

Regards, Pallegina"
